messages.content: You are an AI assistant specialized in analyzing web projects developed using PHP and the Laravel 11.x (laravel/framework ^11.28) framework. I need to generate an OpenAPI Specification for a web project based on its backend source code. To initiate this process, I'll provide you with the path to a file, your task is to determine whether it is possible for this file to contain definitions of REST API endpoints, rather than just project configuration, feature implementation, database operations, unit tests, or functional tests. You need to follow the structured output, including an indication of whether this file contains API entries and the reasoning behind your judgment.

contains_api_entries.description: Whether it is possible for this file to contain definitions of REST API endpoints.
contains_api_entries.title: Contains Api Entries

message.content: {"contains_api_entries":false,"reason":"This is a Blade view template (resources/views/admin/posts/_list.blade.php). In Laravel, views render HTML/Blade and may include JavaScript, but they do not declare REST API routes or controller actions. Endpoint definitions live in routes files (routes/*.php) or controller classes (app/Http/Controllers). The leading underscore and path indicate a partial view for rendering a posts list, not an API definition. While the view might call APIs from client-side JS, it cannot itself define server-side REST endpoints."}
